contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of March, 2002, the Petitions for Allowance of Appeal are GRANTED. The order of the Superior Court is REVERSED and this matter is REMANDED to that court for further consideration in light of this court’s recent opinion in Lititz Mutual Insurance Co. v. Steely, 567 Pa. 98, 785 A.2d 975 (2001).
